layout: post title: “SSH Sever Authentication Config for Root and users” date: 2018-11-29 00:00:00 -0800 categories: SSH, Linxu —

Here to achieve:

  1. Root login with key authentication only
  2. Non-root users login with key or password authentication

Edit /etc/ssh/sshd_config

PermitRootLogin without-password
PasswordAuthentication yes

Restart ssh service

systemctl restart sshd
